long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overhauls the New Tab page with a NoteTab! Quickly jot down notes or messages in a place that you'll easily get reminded of them!

Features:
- "Sticky notes" that stay around even if you restart your computer
- A fully functional search bar 
- Customizable background selection
